title: Ticket #172: condor_reconfig (and others) should return non-zero on failure
description:
If you run condor_reconfig, and there is no running master, you get 

Can't connect to local master

but the exit code is 0. It should return 1. The same goes for other command line tools. restart, off, and on almost certainly have the same behavior, as well as other command line tools.
